snippet: Maccabi Tel Aviv forward Eran Zahavi broke the Israeli league scoring record on Monday with his 30th and 31st goals of the season, beating the 1954-55 record and leading his team to a 3-2 victory against Beitar Jerusalem....

headline.main: Maccabi Tel Aviv's Zahavi Breaks Six-Decade Israeli League Record
headline.print_headline: Maccabi Tel Aviv's Zahavi Breaks Six-Decade Israeli League Record

lead_paragraph: Maccabi Tel Aviv forward Eran Zahavi broke the Israeli league scoring record on Monday with his 30th and 31st goals of the season, beating the 1954-55 record and leading his team to a 3-2 victory against Beitar Jerusalem.

snippet: Ross County beat Hibernian 2-1 with a last-minute goal to win the Scottish League Cup on Sunday and claim their first major trophy since joining the league in 1994....

headline.main: Ross County Win Scottish League Cup for First Major Honour
headline.print_headline: Ross County Win Scottish League Cup for First Major Honour

lead_paragraph: Ross County beat Hibernian 2-1 with a last-minute goal to win the Scottish League Cup on Sunday and claim their first major trophy since joining the league in 1994.

snippet: Watford goalkeeper Heurelho Gomes has labelled Arsenal a "small team" and played down the north London side's Premier League title chances after the Hornets ended their FA Cup campaign on Sunday....

headline.main: 'Small' Arsenal Won't Win League Title-Watford's Gomes
headline.print_headline: 'Small' Arsenal Won't Win League Title-Watford's Gomes

lead_paragraph: Watford goalkeeper Heurelho Gomes has labelled Arsenal a "small team" and played down the north London side's Premier League title chances after the Hornets ended their FA Cup campaign on Sunday.

snippet: The head of the Bundesliga welcomed discussions about revamping the Champions League on Wednesday, seeing a potential European Super League as beneficial for German clubs....

headline.main: Bundesliga CEO Says European Super League Could Help Germany
headline.print_headline: Bundesliga CEO Says European Super League Could Help Germany

lead_paragraph: The head of the Bundesliga welcomed discussions about revamping the Champions League on Wednesday, seeing a potential European Super League as beneficial for German clubs.

snippet: Failure to qualify for Europe's Champions League would cost Manchester United more than 30 million pounds in revenue next season, the club said on Friday after reporting a big rise in quarterly profit....

headline.main: Champions League Absence Would Prove Costly for Man Utd
headline.print_headline: Champions League Absence Would Prove Costly for Man Utd

lead_paragraph: Failure to qualify for Europe's Champions League would cost Manchester United more than 30 million pounds in revenue next season, the club said on Friday after reporting a big rise in quarterly profit.

snippet: Manchester City, struggling for domestic consistency, will take a big step in the right direction if they can qualify for the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time, Brazilian midfielder Fernandinho said....

headline.main: Fernandinho Eyes Champions League First for Manchester City
headline.print_headline: Fernandinho Eyes Champions League First for Manchester City

lead_paragraph: Manchester City, struggling for domestic consistency, will take a big step in the right direction if they can qualify for the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time, Brazilian midfielder Fernandinho said.

snippet: West Ham United will not take Europa League lightly next season after being gifted a spot in the competition by Manchester United's FA Cup triumph, joint chairman David Gold has said....

headline.main: West Ham Will Take the Europa League Seriously-Gold
headline.print_headline: West Ham Will Take the Europa League Seriously-Gold

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will not take Europa League lightly next season after being gifted a spot in the competition by Manchester United's FA Cup triumph, joint chairman David Gold has said.

snippet: Louis van Gaal does not know if he will still be managing Manchester United next season if the club fail to qualify for the Champions League....

headline.main: Van Gaal Unsure of Future if United Miss Champions League
headline.print_headline: Van Gaal Unsure of Future if United Miss Champions League

lead_paragraph: Louis van Gaal does not know if he will still be managing Manchester United next season if the club fail to qualify for the Champions League.

snippet: Defending champions Guangzhou Evergrande claimed their sixth Chinese Super League title in a row after a 1-1 draw with Yanbian Fude on Sunday....

headline.main: Guangzhou Clinch Sixth Consecutive Chinese Super League Title
headline.print_headline: Guangzhou Clinch Sixth Consecutive Chinese Super League Title

lead_paragraph: Defending champions Guangzhou Evergrande claimed their sixth Chinese Super League title in a row after a 1-1 draw with Yanbian Fude on Sunday.

snippet: David Moyes watched from the stands as 10-man Sunderland came from behind to beat Bournemouth 2-1 for their first Premier League win of the season on Saturday....

headline.main: Defoe Fires 10-Man Sunderland to First League Win
headline.print_headline: Defoe Fires 10-Man Sunderland to First League Win

lead_paragraph: David Moyes watched from the stands as 10-man Sunderland came from behind to beat Bournemouth 2-1 for their first Premier League win of the season on Saturday.
